scripts.dev:reset-db: npm run db:reset:local && npm run migrate:apply:local && vite dev
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env prod
scripts.migrate:apply:dev: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --env dev
scripts.migrate:apply:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --env prod --remote
scripts.migrate:list:dev: wrangler d1 migrations list DB --env dev
scripts.migrate:list:prod: wrangler d1 migrations list DB --env prod
scripts.db:backup-info: wrangler d1 time-travel info DB --env prod
